name: market for drying of bread grain, seed and legumes | drying of bread grain, seed and legumes | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/323/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'drying of bread grain, seed and legumes', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;Drying of bread grain, seed and legumes' is a service. The functional unit is kg water evaporated. This module should be used when evaluating drying of bread grains, seed and legumes.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/016:Support activities to agriculture and post-harvest crop activities/0163:Post-harvest crop activities
